questions.question: Which of the following characters is NOT one of the guards standing watch as the play opens?

choices.answer: Barnardo
Marcellus
Fortinbras
Francisco

questions.question: What do the other guards want Horatio to observe?

choices.answer: Norway's troop movement
Prince Hamlet's odd mood
Gertrude and Claudius in a romantic tryst
The ghost of King Hamlet

questions.question: In Act 1 - Scene 1, how many times does the Ghost of King Hamlet speak to the guards?

choices.answer: Zero
One
Two
Three

questions.question: Why does Marcellus think Horatio should speak to the ghost?

choices.answer: Horatio is the most religious of them
Horatio is the only one who does not believe in ghosts
Horatio is a scholar and knows how to address the ghost
Horatio has spoken with the ghost before

questions.question: True or False: Laertes is allowed to return to college in France.

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: In Scene 2, what does the king tell Hamlet?

choices.answer: Go to England to go to the University atCambridge
He is being stubborn by continuing to grieve for his father
He should go on a pilgrimage to honor hisfather
The Queen never really loved King Hamlet(senior)

questions.question: Hamlet's soliloquy in Act 2 conveys that he he upset for two reasons. What are they?

choices.answer: His mom is ignoring him & his fiance cancelled the wedding
His father died & his uncle has declared war on Fortinbras
His father has died & his mother quickly remarried his uncle
He wants to travel for a year but his mother seems unwell

questions.question: What news does Horatio bring Hamlet?

choices.answer: Horatio tells Hamlet of a great plague that has begun
Horatio tells Hamlet that his mother has been banished
Horatio tells Hamlet that Fortinbras is aboutto attack
Horatio tells Hamlet about King Hamlet's ghost

questions.question: What does Hamlet decide to do after he hears Horatio's news?

choices.answer: Decides to go to confession and communion
Decides to have the doctor examine his mother
Decides to go on watch with the guards atmidnight to verify
Decides to ready his army for battle

questions.question: What is Laertes' advice to Ophelia?

choices.answer: To stay away from Hamlet & to protect her virtue
To consider other suitors before making achoice
That she would be better off going to a convent
That Polonius is secretly in love with her

questions.question: Polonius gives Laertes a lot of advice. Which of these statements is NOT part of that advice?

choices.answer: Buy affordable clothing that also gives a good impression
Be neither a borrower nor a lender
To thine own self be true
Do not let your affections and desires control you

questions.question: At the end of Scene 4, Ophelia agrees to obey Polonius' wish. What will she do?

choices.answer: She will marry Fortinbras
She will go into a convent for a year ofprayer.
She will stay away from Hamlet and reject his affections.
She will befriend the Queen to spy on her

questions.question: What did the ghost tell Hamlet?

choices.answer: That he was murdered by Claudius
That Hamlet is really the son of Claudius
That Fortinbras is the rightful ruler ofDenmark
That he should take his mother and flee toSweden for safety

questions.question: The ghost of King Hamlet asks Hamlet to do everything EXCEPT which of the following?

choices.answer: To avenge his death
To marry Ophelia
To always remember him
To spare the queen

questions.question: Hamlet swears Horatio to two things. What are they?

choices.answer: To protect his mother & defend thecountry against Fortinbras
To defend him in battle & to kill Claudius ifhe does not
To attend Mass for him everyday if he dies & marry Ophelia
To keep tonight a secret & to go along w/ his crazy antics
